Returns: Return true to consume this click. Return to false to allow the default action (popping back stack to this entry) to occur.
Parameters: FragmentManager.BackStackEntry: The BackStackEntry whose bread crumb was clicked. May be null, if this bread crumb is for the root of the back stack.
int: Additional information about the entry. Currently always 0.
onBreadCrumbClick(android.app.FragmentMa.Description: Called when a bread crumb is clicked.
onBreadCrumbClick(android.app.FragmentMa.history: Added in API level 12 Deprecated in API level 28
onBreadCrumbClick(android.app.FragmentMa.FullName: public abstract boolean onBreadCrumbClick (FragmentManager.BackStackEntry backStack, int flags)

ClassDesc: This widget is no longer supported. Interface to intercept clicks on the bread crumbs.
